mainBoard.flavorText: Her father Samwise gave her the Red Book for safekeeping before he sailed into the West.

foreignData.flavorText: Ihr Vater Samweis übergab ihr das Rote Buch zur Aufbewahrung, bevor er gen Westen segelte.
foreignData.name: Elanor Gärtner
foreignData.text:
Wenn Elanor Gärtner ins Spiel kommt, erzeuge einen Speise-Spielstein.
Zu Beginn deines Endsegments und falls du in diesem Zug eine Speise geopfert hast, kannst du deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte durchsuchen, sie getappt ins Spiel bringen und danach mischen.

foreignData.flavorText: Su padre, Samsagaz, le entregó el Libro Rojo para que lo custodiase antes de partir hacia el Oeste.
foreignData.name: Elanor Jardner
foreignData.text:
Cuando Elanor Jardner entre al campo de batalla, crea una ficha de Comida.
Al comienzo de tu paso final, si sacrificaste una Comida este turno, puedes buscar en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica, poner esa carta en el campo de batalla girada y luego barajar.

foreignData.flavorText: Son père Samsagace lui confia le Livre Rouge avant de faire voile vers l'Ouest.
foreignData.name: Elanor Gardner
foreignData.text:
Quand Elanor Gardner arrive sur le champ de bataille, créez un jeton Nourriture.
Au début de votre étape de fin, si vous avez sacrifié une nourriture ce tour-ci, vous pouvez chercher dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base, la mettre sur le champ de bataille engagée, puis mélanger.

foreignData.flavorText: Suo padre Samwise le donò il Libro Rosso prima di salpare a ovest, affinché lo custodisse.
foreignData.name: Elanor Gardner
foreignData.text:
Quando Elanor Gardner entra nel campo di battaglia, crea una pedina Cibo.
All'inizio della tua sottofase finale, se hai sacrificato un Cibo in questo turno, puoi passare in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base, metterla sul campo di battaglia TAPpata, poi rimescolare.

foreignData.flavorText: 彼女の父サムワイズは西方に船出する前、赤表紙本の保管を彼女に託した。
foreignData.name: 庭師エラノール
foreignData.text:
庭師エラノールが戦場に出たとき、食物・トークン１つを生成する。
あなたの終了ステップの開始時に、このターンにあなたが食物を生け贄に捧げていた場合、あなたは「あなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カード１枚を探し、タップ状態で戦場に出す。その後、ライブラリーを切り直す。」を選んでもよい。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — ハーフリング・スカウト

foreignData.flavorText: Seu pai, Samwise, deu a ela o Livro Vermelho para guardar antes de partir para o Oeste.
foreignData.name: Elanor Jardineiro
foreignData.text:
Quando Elanor Jardineiro entrar no campo de batalha, crie uma ficha de Comida.
No início de sua etapa final, se você sacrificou uma Comida neste turno, você pode procurar um card de terreno básico em seu grimório, colocá-lo no campo de batalha virado e depois embaralhar.

foreignData.flavorText: 她父亲山姆怀斯在扬帆驶向西方之前，将《红皮书》交给她保管。
foreignData.name: 埃拉诺·加德纳
foreignData.text:
当埃拉诺·加德纳进战场时，派出一个食品衍生物。
在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中牺牲过食品，则你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将该牌横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

mainBoard.name: Elanor Gardner
mainBoard.originalText:
When Elanor Gardner enters the battlefield, create a Food token.
At the beginning of your end step, if you sacrificed a Food this turn, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

rulings.text: Do not eat the delicious cards. No, not even for second breakfast.

Elanor Gardner doesn't need to have been on the battlefield when you sacrificed a Food this turn. For example, if you sacrifice a Food during your first main phase and you cast Elanor Gardner during your second main phase, its last ability will trigger at the beginning of your end step.

Elanor Gardner's last ability will trigger only once during your end step, no matter how many Foods you sacrificed this turn. However, if you haven't sacrificed any Foods this turn as your end step begins, the ability won't trigger at all. It's not possible to sacrifice a Food during the end step in time to have the ability trigger.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures in other sets, it's never a creature type.

If an effect refers to a Food, it means any Food artifact, not just a Food artifact token. For example, you can sacrifice Lembas, an artifact card with the Food subtype, to activate the last ability of Bill the Pony.

Some spells and abilities that create Food tokens may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. You won't create any Food tokens.
You can't sacrifice a Food token to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate the last ability of Bill the Pony.

mainBoard.text:
When Elanor Gardner enters, create a Food token.
At the beginning of your end step, if you sacrificed a Food this turn, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

mainBoard.flavorText: Far and wide Shelob's lesser broods spread from glen to glen, to Dol Guldur and the fastnesses of Mirkwood.

foreignData.flavorText: Kankras Abkömmlinge breiteten sich weit und breit von Tal zu Tal aus, bis sie Dol Guldur und den abgelegenen Düsterwald erreichten.
foreignData.name: Düsterwald-Spinne
foreignData.text:
Todesberührung
Immer wenn die Düsterwald-Spinne angreift, erhält eine legendäre Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, Todesberührung bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: Los vástagos de Ella-Laraña se dispersaban por doquier de valle en valle, hasta el Dol Guldur y las fortalezas del Bosque Negro.
foreignData.name: Araña del Bosque Negro
foreignData.text:
Toque mortal.
Siempre que la Araña del Bosque Negro ataque, la criatura legendaria objetivo que controlas gana la habilidad de toque mortal hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Partout, la progéniture inférieure d'Arachne s'étendait de vallon en vallon, jusqu'à Dol Guldur et les bastions de la Forêt Noire.
foreignData.name: Araignée de la Forêt Noire
foreignData.text:
Contact mortel
À chaque fois que l'Araignée de la Forêt Noire attaque, une créature légendaire ciblée que vous contrôlez acquiert le contact mortel jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: In lungo e in largo si diffondeva la prole minore di Shelob, di valle in valle, fino a Dol Guldur e alla sicurezza di Bosco Atro.
foreignData.name: Ragno di Bosco Atro
foreignData.text:
Tocco letale
Ogniqualvolta il Ragno di Bosco Atro attacca, una creatura leggendaria bersaglio che controlli ha tocco letale fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: シェロブの子はドル・グルドゥアから闇の森の住処まで、広く谷を超えて住まわっていた。
foreignData.name: 闇の森の蜘蛛
foreignData.text:
接死
闇の森の蜘蛛が攻撃するたび、あなたがコントロールしている伝説のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは接死を得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 蜘蛛

foreignData.flavorText: Por toda parte a prole menor de Laracna se alastrou, de vale em vale, até Dol Guldur e os fortes da Floresta das Trevas.
foreignData.name: Aranha da Floresta das Trevas
foreignData.text:
Toque mortífero
Toda vez que Aranha da Floresta das Trevas ataca, a criatura lendária alvo que você controla ganha toque mortífero até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 希洛布的后代散布得既远又广：从一处山谷到另一处山谷，再到多古尔都和黑森林的要塞。
foreignData.name: 黑森林蜘蛛
foreignData.text:
死触
每当黑森林蜘蛛攻击时，目标由你操控的传奇生物获得死触异能直到回合结束。

mainBoard.name: Mirkwood Spider
mainBoard.originalText:
Deathtouch
Whenever Mirkwood Spider attacks, target legendary creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn.
mainBoard.text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Mirkwood Spider attacks, target legendary creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: "My dear old Hobbit, you don't allow for the inquisitiveness of friends. I have known about the existence of the Ring for years."

foreignData.flavorText: „Mein lieber alter Hobbit, du hast nicht mit der Neugier deiner Freunde gerechnet. Ich weiß schon seit Jahren von der Existenz des Rings."
foreignData.name: Meriadoc Brandybock
foreignData.text: Immer wenn ein oder mehrere Halblinge, die du kontrollierst, einen Spieler angreifen, erzeuge einen Speise-Spielstein. (Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{2}, {T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.")

foreignData.flavorText: "Mi viejo y querido hobbit, no tuviste en cuenta la curiosidad de los amigos. Sé de la existencia del Anillo desde hace muchos años".
foreignData.name: Meriadoc Brandigamo
foreignData.text: Siempre que uno o más Medianos que controlas ataquen a un jugador, crea una ficha de Comida. (Es un artefacto con "{2}, {T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Ganas 3 vidas".)

foreignData.flavorText: « Mon cher vieux hobbit, vous ne pouvez pas échapper à la curiosité de vos amis. Je connais l'existence de l'Anneau depuis déjà plusieurs années. »
foreignData.name: Meriadoc Brandebouc
foreignData.text: À chaque fois qu'au moins un halfelin que vous contrôlez attaque un joueur, créez un jeton Nourriture. (C'est un artefact avec « {2}, {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Vous gagnez 3 points de vie. »)

foreignData.flavorText: "Mio caro, vecchio Hobbit, non soddisfi la curiosità di un amico. Ero a conoscenza dell'esistenza dell'Anello da anni."
foreignData.name: Meriadoc Brandibuck
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta uno o più Halfling che controlli attaccano un giocatore, crei una pedina Cibo. (È un artefatto con "{2}, {T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Guadagni 3 punti vita".)

foreignData.flavorText: 「僕たちの好奇心の強さはご存知でしょう、愛すべき老ホビットさん。指輪のことは、何年も前から知っていましたよ。」
foreignData.name: メリアドク・ブランディバック
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールしている１体以上のハーフリングがプレイヤー１人を攻撃するたび、食物・トークン１つを生成する。（それは、「{2}, {T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：あなたは３点のライフを得る。」を持つアーティファクトである。）
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — ハーフリング・市民

foreignData.flavorText: "Meu caro velho hobbit, você não conta com a curiosidade dos amigos. Eu sei da existência do Anel há anos."
foreignData.name: Meriadoc Brandebuque
foreignData.text: Toda vez que um ou mais Pequeninos que você controla atacarem um jogador, crie uma ficha de Comida. (Ela é um artefato com "{2}, {T}, sacrifique este artefato: Você ganha 3 pontos de vida".)

foreignData.flavorText: 「我亲爱的老霍比特，你都没考虑到朋友的好奇心啊。我很多年前就已经知道魔戒的存在了。」
foreignData.name: 梅里阿道克·白兰地鹿
foreignData.text: 每当由你操控的一个或数个半身人攻击一位牌手时，派出一个食品衍生物。（它是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

mainBoard.name: Meriadoc Brandybuck
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever one or more Halflings you control attack a player, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

rulings.text: Do not eat the delicious cards. No, not even for second breakfast.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures in other sets, it's never a creature type.
Halflings attacking a planeswalker or battle won't cause Meriadoc Brandybuck's ability to trigger.

If an effect refers to a Food, it means any Food artifact, not just a Food artifact token. For example, you can sacrifice Lembas, an artifact card with the Food subtype, to activate the last ability of Bill the Pony.
Meriadoc Brandybuck's ability has you create just one Food token per player you attack with a Halfling, no matter how many Halflings you attack them with beyond the first.

Some spells and abilities that create Food tokens may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. You won't create any Food tokens.
You can't sacrifice a Food token to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate the last ability of Bill the Pony.

mainBoard.text: Whenever one or more Halflings you control attack a player, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Your land must be a realm of peace and content, and there must gardeners be in high honor."
—Faramir

foreignData.flavorText:
„Euer Land muss ein Hort des Friedens und der Zufriedenheit sein, und eure Gärtner hoch angesehene Leute."
—Faramir
foreignData.name: Brandywein-Bäuerin
foreignData.text: Wenn die Brandywein-Bäuerin ins Spiel kommt oder das Spiel verlässt, erzeuge einen Speise-Spielstein. (Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{2}, {T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.")

foreignData.flavorText:
"Vuestra tierra parece un remanso de paz y tranquilidad, e indudablemente estimáis a los jardineros".
—Faramir
foreignData.name: Granjera del Brandivino
foreignData.text: Cuando la Granjera del Brandivino entre a o deje el campo de batalla, crea una ficha de Comida. (Es un artefacto con "{2}, {T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Ganas 3 vidas".)

foreignData.flavorText:
« Votre pays doit être une terre de paix et de satisfaction, et les jardiniers doivent y être tenus en grand honneur. »
—Faramir
foreignData.name: Fermière du Brandevin
foreignData.text: Quand la Fermière du Brandevin arrive sur le champ de bataille ou le quitte, créez un jeton Nourriture. (C'est un artefact avec « {2}, {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Vous gagnez 3 points de vie. »)

foreignData.flavorText:
"La tua terra deve essere un regno di pace e contentezza, dove i giardinieri devono godere di alta considerazione."
—Faramir
foreignData.name: Contadina del Brandivino
foreignData.text: Quando la Contadina del Brandivino entra nel campo di battaglia o lo lascia, crea una pedina Cibo. (È un artefatto con "{2}, {T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Guadagni 3 punti vita".)

foreignData.flavorText:
「そこは平和で喜び溢れる場所でなければならないだろう。そして気高い庭師も居なければならない。」
――ファラミア
foreignData.name: ブランディワインの農民
foreignData.text: ブランディワインの農民が戦場に出たか戦場を離れたとき、食物・トークン１つを生成する。（それは、「{2}, {T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：あなたは３点のライフを得る。」を持つアーティファクトである。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ハーフリング・農民

foreignData.flavorText:
"Sua terra deve ser um reino de paz e contentamento, e lá os jardineiros devem ser da mais alta estima."
— Faramir
foreignData.name: Fazendeira do Brandevin
foreignData.text: Quando Fazendeira do Brandevin entrar no campo de batalha ou o deixar, crie uma ficha de Comida. (Ela é um artefato com "{2}, {T}, sacrifique este artefato: Você ganha 3 pontos de vida".)

foreignData.flavorText:
「想必你们的国度是个和平、快乐的地方，园丁在那一定备受敬重。」
～法拉米尔
foreignData.name: 白兰地河农夫
foreignData.text: 当白兰地河农夫进入或离开战场时，派出一个食品衍生物。（它是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

mainBoard.name: Brandywine Farmer
mainBoard.originalText: When Brandywine Farmer enters or leaves the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

rulings.text: Do not eat the delicious cards. No, not even for second breakfast.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures in other sets, it's never a creature type.

If an effect refers to a Food, it means any Food artifact, not just a Food artifact token. For example, you can sacrifice Lembas, an artifact card with the Food subtype, to activate the last ability of Bill the Pony.

Some spells and abilities that create Food tokens may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. You won't create any Food tokens.
You can't sacrifice a Food token to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate the last ability of Bill the Pony.

mainBoard.text: When Brandywine Farmer enters or leaves the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

mainBoard.flavorText:
"But still the sunken stars appear
In dark and windless Mirrormere;
There lies his crown in water deep,
Till Durin wakes again from sleep."
—Gimli's song

foreignData.flavorText:
„Auch heute noch die Sterne steh'n
im windlos dunklen Spiegelsee;
Dort ruht die Kron' als schwere Last,
bis Durin wacht aus tiefer Rast."
—Gimlis Lied
foreignData.name: Wächterin des Spiegelsees
foreignData.text: Wenn die Wächterin des Spiegelsees stirbt, führt der Ring dich in Versuchung.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Las estrellas ahogadas aparecen sin cesar
en la oscuridad y el silencio del Lago Espejo,
y hasta que Durin vuelva a despertar
en el agua profunda la corona emite su reflejo".
—Canción de Gimli
foreignData.name: Guardiana del Lago Espejo
foreignData.text: Cuando la Guardiana del Lago Espejo muera, el Anillo te tienta.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Mais toujours les étoiles englouties se font voir
Dans le sombre et paisible Lac du Miroir ;
Sa couronne repose au fond des eaux,
Jusqu'à ce que Durin s'éveille à nouveau. »
—Chanson de Gimli
foreignData.name: Vigile du Lac du Miroir
foreignData.text: Quand le Vigile du Lac du Miroir meurt, l'Anneau vous tente.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Ma ancora appaiono le stelle morenti
Nel Mirolago oscuro e senza venti;
La sua corona giace in quegli abissi,
Finché Durin riaprirà gli occhi fissi."
—Canzone di Gimli
foreignData.name: Guardiana del Mirolago
foreignData.text: Quando la Guardiana del Mirolago muore, l'Anello ti tenta.

foreignData.flavorText:
「沈みし星はなお光る、
暗く凪たる鏡の湖。
深きに眠る彼の王冠、
ドゥリンが再び目覚むまで。」
——ギムリの歌
foreignData.name: 鏡の湖の守護者
foreignData.text: 鏡の湖の守護者が死亡したとき、指輪があなたを誘惑する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ドワーフ・兵士

foreignData.flavorText:
"Ainda as estrelas submersas vêm dentro
Do Lago-espelho, escuro e sem vento
Sua coroa nas águas profundas jaz lá
Até Dúrin de novo do sono acordar. "
— Canção de Gimli
foreignData.name: Guardiã do Lago-espelho
foreignData.text: Quando Guardiã do Lago-espelho morre, o Anel tenta você.

foreignData.flavorText:
「沉沦星辰今犹见，
静湖镜影幽底现；
都林冠冕匿水间，
唯待苏醒重赋衔。」
～吉姆利之歌
foreignData.name: 镜影湖守护者
foreignData.text: 当镜影湖守护者死去时，魔戒引诱你。

mainBoard.name: Mirrormere Guardian
mainBoard.originalText: When Mirrormere Guardian dies, the Ring tempts you.

rulings.text: As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become (or remain) your Ring-bearer.
Each player can have only one emblem named The Ring and only one Ring-bearer at a time.
Each time the Ring tempts you, you must choose a creature if you control one.

If the creature you choose as your Ring-bearer was already your Ring-bearer, that still counts as choosing that creature as your Ring-bearer for the purpose of abilities that trigger "whenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer" or abilities that care about which creature was chosen as your Ring-bearer.

Some spells and abilities that cause the Ring to tempt you may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. The Ring won't tempt you.
The Ring can tempt you even if you don't control a creature. In this case, abilities that trigger "whenever the Ring tempts you" will still trigger.
The Ring gains its abilities in order from top to bottom. Once it gains an ability, it has that ability for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.text: When Mirrormere Guardian dies, the Ring tempts you.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Aragorn has need of his kindred. Let the Dúnedain go to him in Rohan!"

foreignData.flavorText: „Aragorn braucht die Unterstützung seiner Sippe. Lasst die Dúnedain nach Rohan ziehen, um sich ihm anzuschließen!"
foreignData.name: Waldläufer der Dúnedain
foreignData.text: Landung — Immer wenn ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt und falls du keinen Ringträger kontrollierst, führt der Ring dich in Versuchung.

foreignData.flavorText: "Aragorn necesita el auxilio de los suyos. ¡Que los dúnedain lo acompañen en Rohan!".
foreignData.name: Montaraces dúnedain
foreignData.text: Aterrizaje — Siempre que una tierra entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, si no controlas un portador del Anillo, el Anillo te tienta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Aragorn a besoin des siens. Que les Dúnedains aillent le rejoindre en Rohan ! »
foreignData.name: Rangers dúnedains
foreignData.text: Toucheterre — À chaque fois qu'un terrain arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, si vous ne contrôlez pas de porteur de l'Anneau, l'Anneau vous tente.

foreignData.flavorText: "Aragorn ha bisogno della sua gente. Che i Dúnedain lo raggiungano a Rohan!"
foreignData.name: Raminghi Dúnedain
foreignData.text: Terraferma — Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, se non controlli un Portatore dell'Anello, l'Anello ti tenta.

foreignData.flavorText: 「アラゴルンには一族の助けが必要だ。ドゥネダインをローハンにいる彼の元へ送れ！」
foreignData.name: ドゥネダインのレンジャー
foreignData.text: 上陸 ― 土地１つがあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、あなたが指輪所持者をコントロールしていない場合、指輪があなたを誘惑する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・レインジャー

foreignData.flavorText: "Aragorn precisa de seu povo. Que os Dúnedain sigam para encontrá-lo em Rohan!"
foreignData.name: Caminheiros Dúnedain
foreignData.text: Aterragem — Toda vez que um terreno entra no campo de batalha sob seu controle, se você não controla um Guardião do Anel, o Anel tenta você.

foreignData.flavorText: 「阿拉贡需要自己的族人。让杜内丹人追随他去洛汗！」
foreignData.name: 杜内丹游民
foreignData.text: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，若你未操控持戒人，则魔戒引诱你。

mainBoard.name: Dúnedain Rangers
mainBoard.originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you don't control a Ring-bearer, the Ring tempts you.

rulings.text: As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become (or remain) your Ring-bearer.
Each player can have only one emblem named The Ring and only one Ring-bearer at a time.
Each time the Ring tempts you, you must choose a creature if you control one.

If the creature you choose as your Ring-bearer was already your Ring-bearer, that still counts as choosing that creature as your Ring-bearer for the purpose of abilities that trigger "whenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer" or abilities that care about which creature was chosen as your Ring-bearer.

Some spells and abilities that cause the Ring to tempt you may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. The Ring won't tempt you.
The Ring can tempt you even if you don't control a creature. In this case, abilities that trigger "whenever the Ring tempts you" will still trigger.
The Ring gains its abilities in order from top to bottom. Once it gains an ability, it has that ability for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.originalText: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn. The Ring tempts you. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

rulings.text: As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become (or remain) your Ring-bearer.
Each player can have only one emblem named The Ring and only one Ring-bearer at a time.
Each time the Ring tempts you, you must choose a creature if you control one.

If the creature you choose as your Ring-bearer was already your Ring-bearer, that still counts as choosing that creature as your Ring-bearer for the purpose of abilities that trigger "whenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer" or abilities that care about which creature was chosen as your Ring-bearer.

Some spells and abilities that cause the Ring to tempt you may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. The Ring won't tempt you.
The Ring can tempt you even if you don't control a creature. In this case, abilities that trigger "whenever the Ring tempts you" will still trigger.
The Ring gains its abilities in order from top to bottom. Once it gains an ability, it has that ability for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn. The Ring tempts you. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

mainBoard.name: Revive the Shire
mainBoard.originalText: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

rulings.text: Do not eat the delicious cards. No, not even for second breakfast.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures in other sets, it's never a creature type.

If an effect refers to a Food, it means any Food artifact, not just a Food artifact token. For example, you can sacrifice Lembas, an artifact card with the Food subtype, to activate the last ability of Bill the Pony.

Some spells and abilities that create Food tokens may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. You won't create any Food tokens.
You can't sacrifice a Food token to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate the last ability of Bill the Pony.

mainBoard.text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
